languages.text: "Фарказа Эзирраеш, Отравительница Асдружара и Отмеченная Шаймеш, была одной из таких возвышенных предводительниц друкари. Результат..." {n}Маражай небрежно взмахивает рукой, словно приглашая вас как следует полюбоваться его персоной.{/n} "...оправдал сложности".

"Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Poisoner of Asdruzhar and Shaimesh's Elect, was one such exalted leader of the Drukhari. The result..." {n}Marazhai casually waves a hand, inviting you to admire his person.{/n} "...was worth the effort."
languages.original_text: "Фарказа Эзирраеш, Отравительница Асдружара и Отмеченная Шаймеш, была одной из таких возвышенных предводительниц друкари. Результат..." {n}Маражай небрежно взмахивает рукой, словно приглашая вас как следует полюбоваться его персоной.{/n} "...оправдал сложности".

traits.locale_text: "Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Poisoner of Asdruzhar and Shaimesh's Elect, was one such exalted leader of the Drukhari. The result..." {n}Marazhai casually waves a hand, inviting you to admire his person.{/n} "...was worth the effort."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Poisoner of Asdruzhar and Shaimesh's Elect, was one such exalted leader of the Drukhari. The result..." {n}Marazhai casually waves a hand, inviting you to admire his person.{/n} "...was worth the effort."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Poisoner of Asdruzhar and Shaimesh's Elect, was one such exalted leader of the Drukhari. The result..." {n}Marazhai casually waves a hand, inviting you to admire his person.{/n} "...was worth the effort."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Poisoner of Asdruzhar and Shaimesh's Elect, was one such exalted leader of the Drukhari. The result..." {n}Marazhai casually waves a hand, inviting you to admire his person.{/n} "...was worth the effort."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Envenenador de Asdruzhar y Elegido de Shaimesh, era uno de dichos líderes Drukhari. El resultado...». {n}Marazhai hace un gesto con la mano, invitándote a admirarle.{/n} «... valió la pena».
languages.original_text: "Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Poisoner of Asdruzhar and Shaimesh's Elect, was one such exalted leader of the Drukhari. The result..." {n}Marazhai casually waves a hand, inviting you to admire his person.{/n} "...was worth the effort."

traits.locale_text: «Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Envenenador de Asdruzhar y Elegido de Shaimesh, era uno de dichos líderes Drukhari. El resultado...». {n}Marazhai hace un gesto con la mano, invitándote a admirarle.{/n} «... valió la pena».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “法卡扎·艾泽拉什，阿萨杜查的毒师、赛美什的蒙选者，便是这样一位受人尊崇的黑暗灵族领袖。而她的结果……”{n}玛拉斋挥了挥手，邀请你欣赏他本人。{/n}“……值得她的付出。”
languages.original_text: "Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Poisoner of Asdruzhar and Shaimesh's Elect, was one such exalted leader of the Drukhari. The result..." {n}Marazhai casually waves a hand, inviting you to admire his person.{/n} "...was worth the effort."

traits.locale_text: “法卡扎·艾泽拉什，阿萨杜查的毒师、赛美什的蒙选者，便是这样一位受人尊崇的黑暗灵族领袖。而她的结果……”{n}玛拉斋挥了挥手，邀请你欣赏他本人。{/n}“……值得她的付出。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「アエジレシュの毒殺者であり、シャイメシュの選民であるファルカザ・エジルラエシュは、デュカーリ高位のエグザルテッドの指導者のひとりだった。その結果は…」{n}マラズハイは、その出生を賞賛せよとでもいうように軽く手を振る。{/n}「…努力しただけの甲斐があったというもんだ」
languages.original_text: "Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Poisoner of Asdruzhar and Shaimesh's Elect, was one such exalted leader of the Drukhari. The result..." {n}Marazhai casually waves a hand, inviting you to admire his person.{/n} "...was worth the effort."

traits.locale_text: 「アエジレシュの毒殺者であり、シャイメシュの選民であるファルカザ・エジルラエシュは、デュカーリ高位のエグザルテッドの指導者のひとりだった。その結果は…」{n}マラズハイは、その出生を賞賛せよとでもいうように軽く手を振る。{/n}「…努力しただけの甲斐があったというもんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Empoisonneuse d'Asdruzhar et Élue de Shaimesh, faisait partie de ces illustres chefs drukharis. Et comme vous pouvez le voir... » {n}D'un geste désinvolte, Marazhai vous invite à admirer sa personne.{/n} « ... le résultat en valait la peine. »
languages.original_text: "Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Poisoner of Asdruzhar and Shaimesh's Elect, was one such exalted leader of the Drukhari. The result..." {n}Marazhai casually waves a hand, inviting you to admire his person.{/n} "...was worth the effort."

traits.locale_text: « Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Empoisonneuse d'Asdruzhar et Élue de Shaimesh, faisait partie de ces illustres chefs drukharis. Et comme vous pouvez le voir... » {n}D'un geste désinvolte, Marazhai vous invite à admirer sa personne.{/n} « ... le résultat en valait la peine. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Gefangener von Asdruzhar und Shaimesh Auserwählter, war ein solch erhabener Anführer der Drukhari. Das Ergebnis"{n}, Marazhai führt eine theatralische Handbewegung aus, mit der er dich einlädt, seine Person zu bewundern,{/n} "war die Mühe wert".
languages.original_text: "Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Poisoner of Asdruzhar and Shaimesh's Elect, was one such exalted leader of the Drukhari. The result..." {n}Marazhai casually waves a hand, inviting you to admire his person.{/n} "...was worth the effort."

traits.locale_text: "Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Gefangener von Asdruzhar und Shaimesh Auserwählter, war ein solch erhabener Anführer der Drukhari. Das Ergebnis"{n}, Marazhai führt eine theatralische Handbewegung aus, mit der er dich einlädt, seine Person zu bewundern,{/n} "war die Mühe wert".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Poisoner of Asdruzhar and Shaimesh's Elect, was one such exalted leader of the Drukhari. The result..." {n}Marazhai casually waves a hand, inviting you to admire his person.{/n} "...was worth the effort."

languages.text: "İşte Asdruzhar'ı Zehirleyen, Shaimesh'çe Seçilen Farkaza Aezyrraesh de öyle haşmetli bir Drukhari önderiydi. Sonuç..." {n}Marazhai, gelişigüzel elini sallayıp kendini gösteriyor.{/n} "Sonuç ortada."
languages.original_text: "Farkaza Aezyrraesh, Poisoner of Asdruzhar and Shaimesh's Elect, was one such exalted leader of the Drukhari. The result..." {n}Marazhai casually waves a hand, inviting you to admire his person.{/n} "...was worth the effort."

traits.locale_text: "İşte Asdruzhar'ı Zehirleyen, Shaimesh'çe Seçilen Farkaza Aezyrraesh de öyle haşmetli bir Drukhari önderiydi. Sonuç..." {n}Marazhai, gelişigüzel elini sallıyor ve kendini gösteriyor.{/n} "...Sonuç ortada."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
